name: Krood
content: Krood was a Trandoshan who lived in the Coruscant underworld. After a speeder flown by a group of Believers crashed in the Undercity, a group of spacers who were pursuing it arrived shortly afterward and Krood—along with the Human Ilok, the Coruscani ogre Bartle and the Trandoshans Dure and Sounac—was among the group who attacked them.
